alert.note: Alert for Henry; Johnson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 7:45PM CDT until July 17 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR EASTERN HENRY AND SOUTH CENTRAL JOHNSON COUNTIES... At 745 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Clinton, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Clinton, Leeton, Calhoun, Chilhowee, Coal, Brownington, Tightwad, Post Oak and Truman Lake. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
